Sep 1, 2006

Alternatives

One thing I’ve learned about the British: they love to tell you alternative routes. If you ask how to get from point A to point B, don’t expect to just be told the shortest, quickest, route as a New Yorker might tell you. No, the British will tell you a half a dozen possibilities. My father-in-law isn’t British, but he’s Cambridge educated. We o...
